捘字的基本解释

捘
zùn
推。
按；捏：“生扶之，阴捘其腕。”

捘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zùn］
［《廣韻》子寸切，去慁，精。］
［《廣韻》七倫切，平諄，清。］
［《廣韻》子對切，去隊，精。］
(1)推，挤。
(2)按；搓捏。
(3)见“捘削”。
(4)见“捘捘”。

捘字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　捘； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页434第13
【唐韻】子寸切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】祖寸切，?尊去聲。【說文】推也。【增韻】擠也，掐也。【左傳·定八年】涉佗捘衞侯之手及捥。【註】血至捥。　又【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?七倫切，音逡。義同。又【廣雅】按也。　又【集韻】祖回切，音嗺。讀若醉平聲。又津垂切，音厜。義?同。　又【唐韻】子對切【集韻】祖對切，?音晬。亦推也。或作捽。　又【集韻】取內切，音倅。又祖猥切，嗺上聲。義?同。

捘字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
捘字的起名意思

暂无。

捘
Basic explanation of words
捘
zùn
Push.
Press; squeeze: "Provide and help him, and slap his wrists in the dark."
捘
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zùn］
["Guangyun" sub-cun cut, sullen, refined. ]
["Guangyun" Qi Lunqie, smooth and clear. ]
["Guangyun" sub-cut, go to the team, fine. ]
(1) Push, squeeze.
(2) Press; knead.
(3) See "Cutting".
(4) See "捘捘".
捘
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　捘; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 434 13
[Tang Yun] Zi Cun Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Zu Cun Cut, Zun Qusheng. [Said Wen] Push also. [Zeng Yun] Squeeze, pinch. [Zuo Zhuan·Eight Years of Ding] She Tuo Shuo Weihou's hand and Bao. 【Note】Blood till the end.　 [Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Seven Lun cuts, sound. The same meaning. [Guang Ya] Press again.　[Jiyun] The ancestor cuts back, the sound is 嗺. Reading if drunk flat. It cuts down again, and the sound is choppy. Righteous? Same.　[Tang Yun] The sub-cut [Jiyun] The ancestor cut again,? Yinzhu. Also push also. Or make a slap.　[Jiyun] Take the inside cut, the sound. And the ancestors cut, and sounded. Righteous? Same.
